Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can you upgrade the RAM of an Android device?  In using the MK802III I find that at times it is struggling, the more browser pages I open, and sometimes it just reboots itself.I know it has a micro SD slot for additional storage space, but can this be used for the OS's memory, or similarly, could a connected USB stick be used as well?
Title: Is there a way to extend the MK802 III's memory?

history.Text: In using the MK802III I find that at times it is struggling, the more browser pages I open, and sometimes it just reboots itself.I know it has a micro SD slot for additional storage space, but can this be used for the OS's memory, or similarly, could a connected USB stick be used as well?
Is there a way to extend the MK802 III's memory?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Can you upgrade the RAM of an Android device?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/22997/can-you-upgrade-the-ram-of-an-android-device)  In using the MK802III I find that at times it is struggling, the more browser pages I open, and sometimes it just reboots itself.I know it has a micro SD slot for additional storage space, but can this be used for the OS's memory, or similarly, could a connected USB stick be used as well?
